<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall surely be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H2428>army,<s%> which shall <S%H3920>take<s%> it.

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H5046>declare<s%> it to you, will you not surely put me to <S%H4191>death?<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> I give you <S%H3289>counsel,<s%> will you not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me?

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you will <S%H3318>assuredly<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H8269>princes,<s%> then your <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall not be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> and you shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and your <S%H1004>house:<s%>

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> I am <S%H1672>afraid<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> they <S%H5414>deliver<s%> me into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they <S%H5953>mock<s%> me.

But <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> They shall not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you. <S%H8085>Obey,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you: so it shall be <S%H3190>well<s%> to you, and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7200>showed<s%> me:
